Description: Papyrus; Demotic legal text (transfer of rights) recto.
Curator's comments: Formerly catalogued as EA 10505 fragments C-L (cf. entry for it). Edited in S.E. Thomas Cambridge PhD diss. Text 29 in Shore's Manuscript Catalogue of Demotic Gebelein Papyri in the British Museum. Publication in progress (S.E. Thomas).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (130909) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/130909)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loss Black ink (loss) Supported overall: white paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth, masking tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
